We all know 1 + 1 is 2?

title: Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli
text:
Hi there! Welcome to my profile!
I am a data science educator and a first-generation college graduate. My wife, Dr. Kiran, and I co-founded the SARA Institute of Data Science, India, with the mission of making data science education accessible to the general public in India.
When I’m not working, you’ll find me jogging or experimenting in the kitchen.
I’d love to connect and chat with you! hello world

title: Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli
text:
Education
University of Hyderabad | Hyderabad, Telangana.
PhD in Management Studies | Aug 2010 - Sept 2019
University of Wurzburg | Wurzburg, Germany.
Research Stay | Jan 2014 - Feb 2014
Pondicherry Central University | Pondicherry, India. M.B.A. Tourism Studies | 2006 - 2008   Gold Medalist.
Jawaharlal Nehru University | New Delhi, India.
B.A. Hons. Russian Language | 2003 - 2006
